The image was flagged as part of Faceboo: s efforts to combat false news and misinformation on its News Feed.
A reverse: image search was conducted to track down the origin of the photo, which led to its discovery in Everett, Washington, not San Francisco.
The Daily Herald: a local news outlet, documented the project in Everett where the image was taken, confirming its authenticity.
